description.text: , a Full-Stack Web Engineer specializing in TypeScript, Next.js, React, Node.js, and AI-enhanced systems. I've delivered scalable software for clients in Germany, Singapore, the U.S., and Chile‚Äîmaintaining a 100% Job Success Score as a Top Rated talent on Upwork.
description.focus: My focus is building clean, fast, purposeful products that improve how teams operate.

problem.title: Tired of developers
problem.subtitle: You need a
problem.subtitleEnd: , not a robot. Someone who understands your business, thinks like an owner, and ships code that actually moves the needle.
problem.sectionTitle: Most common issues I see in development teams:

technicalDebt.name: Technical debt (spaghetti code)
technicalDebt.description: Fragile systems where fixing one bug creates three more. Scaling becomes expensive and risky.

noVision.name: Executors with no vision
noVision.description: Developers who act like robots: they wait for exact instructions and miss UX or business issues.

ghostDeadlines.name: Ghost deadlines
ghostDeadlines.description: Estimates that never hold. Tickets drag on week after week with no real delivery date.

excuses.name: Excuses, not results
excuses.description: The classic ‚Äúit works on my machine‚Äù mindset. When production is on fire, nobody takes control.

scalableArchitecture.name: Scalable architecture
scalableArchitecture.description: I write clean, modular, documented code. Your project is easy to maintain today and scale tomorrow.

productPartner.name: Product partner
productPartner.description: I don‚Äôt just code; I understand your business. I suggest strategic improvements to maximize product value.

totalOwnership.name: Full ownership
totalOwnership.description: I treat your project like it‚Äôs mine. If a problem comes up, I take responsibility and lead the fix to the end.

radicalTransparency.name: Radical transparency
radicalTransparency.description: No confusing jargon. I keep communication steady so you always know the real development status.

projects.section_subtitle: Explore my most recent work and creative solutions.

reviews.title: What my clients say
reviews.subtitle: Real feedback from valued clients, highlighting the quality and value of my work.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Building software with soul and precision
about.description: I believe code shouldn‚Äôt just work: it should have purpose. I went from breaking systems out of curiosity to designing structures with ethics. Today I turn ideas into platforms that blend art, engineering, and a dose of well-directed rebellion.

methodology.title: Philosophy and methodology
methodology.description: My way of working is built on three pillars: architectural clarity, autonomy to solve, and impact in every line of code. I rely on strict typing, living documentation, and transparent communication.

workStyle.title: Work style
workStyle.description: Agile, autonomous, and detail-oriented. I propose solutions instead of waiting for instructions.

personal.title: Beyond the code
personal.subtitle: Who am I? .... someone who likes to break things out of curiosity
personal.description: I‚Äôm inspired by Hofmann and Leary, but also by the silence of the forest. Between commits and coffee, I study AI, explore responsible psychedelia, and create content for other developers. I believe justice‚Äîeven in software‚Äîis a form of love.

specialties.description: Next.js, React, TypeScript, and systems where the interface matters as much as the logic.

stack.description: Node.js, Prisma ORM, tRPC, PostgreSQL, and scalable architectures with frictionless deployments.

review-01.title: Full-stack Developer (React / NextJs / Tailwind) to build a dashboard

review-02.title: Frontend Specialist for Marketplace (Next.js) - Ongoing project 95% ready (Bugs + small tickets)
review-02.feedback: Nicolas was a great hire: very determined, motivated, and with strong attention to detail. Even though he‚Äôs young, he brings everything needed to get the job done.

review-03.title: Fix static pages in CMS
review-03.feedback: Nicolas works very fast and proposed a much better solution for the issue that needed to be solved. He made a few additional adjustments without being asked. I‚Äôm always satisfied.

review-04.title: DevOps Engineer expert in Next.js, Nginx, and Automation
review-04.feedback: Nicolas did a 3-day job in just 12 hours. He met all requirements and also handled a few extra tasks. It‚Äôs always a pleasure working with Nicolas. Thank you.

review-05.title: Fileserver milestone 2
review-05.feedback: Nicolas helped me refine the file server upload features and implemented them in an existing function. He was willing to help with items outside the scope.

review-06.title: Ubuntu DO file server with drag and drop
review-06.feedback: Nicolas built a drag-and-drop file server feature and helped me when needed. He‚Äôs fast, knowledgeable, and willing to go the extra mile.

review-07.title: Crypto screener using React.js
review-07.feedback: Nicolas is an exceptional freelancer whose technical skill is matched only by his commitment to excellence. With a tight deadline, he delivered full functionality.

review-08.title: Quick10x: Real-time crypto analytics SaaS platform ‚Äî Help with Nodemailer JS setup
review-08.feedback: Very punctual, focused on the task, and the project was delivered within the expected timeframe. Thank you!

review-09.title: Full-Stack Developer needed for legal compliance MVP
review-09.feedback: It‚Äôs been great working with Nicolas. He understands complex concepts quickly and turns them into intuitive, functional solutions.

review-10.title: Front End Developer - Shadcn Admin Kit

review-13.title: Expert .NextJS developer needed for backend restructuring

review-15.title: Frontend Specialist for Marketplace (Next.js) ‚Äî Long-term ongoing project
review-15.feedback: We hired Nicolas to fix bugs, but soon realized he‚Äôs incredibly talented and picks up tasks ultra-fast. We extended him into a much longer project.

review-16.title: Full Stack Engineer - Applied AI Systems
review-16.feedback: Nicolas is a great engineer‚Äîbrings strong energy and enthusiasm. Highly recommended.

review-17.title: React & Node dev needed (Web App: Node, React, MUI & MySQL)

review-18.title: Recreate website in React
review-18.feedback: It was an absolute pleasure working with Nicolas. Very responsive, excellent code, and ongoing support.
